show.subtitle: Connect the Dots promotes health activism, linking personal health to the health of our culture, society, and environment.
show.title: Connect The Dots

title: Connect The Dots
content:
On this show, Alison connects the dots with leading physicist and educator, Amit Goswami, PhD, the author of How... <!--more--> Quantum Activism Can Change Civilization.
Professor Goswami shows how quantum physics, helps us live our spirituality and take action in the world.
This programâ€™s featured health action is preventing GMOs from invading the organic food supply, through links here: http://healthjournalistblog.
com/step-up-to-quantum-activism/ where you can also sign up for upcoming radio show announcements and activism.
